name: ubc-farm-server-proxy
description: Reverse proxy parent server that directs requests to the correct subservers. Allows for easier code splitting, as well as the potential for certain functions to be moved to seperate systems in the future
author: Tiger Oakes <tigeroakes@gmail.com> (http://tigeroakes.com)

scripts.start:api: cd ../ubc-farm-api && npm run prepublish && npm start
scripts.start:static: cd ../ubc-farm-static-assets && npm run prepublish && npm start
scripts.start:package: cd ../ubc-farm-package-server && npm run prepublish && npm run watch
scripts.start:views: cd ../ubc-farm-views-server && npm run prepublish && npm run watch
scripts.start: start npm run start:api && start npm run start:static && start npm run start:package && start npm run start:views
